main event: A silver object with orange markings was observed falling in Ontario, California on June 10, 1955.
interesting points: The object had a round shape and swept back wings., The observation lasted approximately 2 minutes., The object appeared to be turning end over end while falling., It was noted that the object could possibly have been a payload dropped by a balloon., Insufficient data for thorough evaluation was provided.
sighted object: a round silver object with orange markings
witness description: the witness was a housewife in Ontario
